HTML p-tags.description:
Add opening and closing

tags for paragraph text formatting in HTML

HTML hr-tags.description: Add horizontal rule tag in HTML

HTML bold tag.description: Add opening and closing <b> tags for bold text formatting in HTML

HTML italic tag.description: Add opening and closing <i> tags for italic text formatting in HTML

HTML underline tag.description: Add opening and closing <u> tags for underlined text formatting in HTML

HTML em-tags.description: Add opening and closing <em> tags for emphasized (italic) text formatting in HTML

HTML strong-tags.description: Add opening and closing <strong> tags for strong (bold) text formatting in HTML

HTML sub-tags.description: Add opening and closing <sub> tags for subscript text formatting in HTML

HTML sup-tags.description: Add opening and closing <sup> tags for superscript text formatting in HTML

description:
Add opening and closing <h1> tags for section heading text formatting in HTML
<h1> is the largest heading and <h6> is the smallest
Cannot be used inside HTML tables within a Liquid template
